p:
Newly generated consensus and published pol sequences from coastal Kenya were combined, codon-aligned using ClustalX 2.0.11, and manually adjusted in Geneious Prime 2019 (Version 2019 2.1) ( https://www.geneious.com)
52 . The combined sequences were then aligned with the Group M (subtypes A-K + Recombinants) HIV-1 subtype reference dataset downloaded from Los Alamos HIV Database ( http://www.hiv.lanl.gov/)
49 .
